code:
%% Translatable Attachments flow
flowchart LR
  subgraph DB[Education_GradeSync]
    A[Education_ClassroomService]
  end

  M[Education_LMS_Portal] --> A

  Init[Education_GradeSync]
  Init -->|require backend| B[Education_GradeSync]
  Init -->|register backend| Mobility[Education_LMS_Portal]

  B -->|provides| Apply[Education_LMS_Portal]

  ModelCanonical[Education_ContentCDN]
  ModelDSL[Education_ContentCDN]

  ModelCanonical --> Apply
  ModelDSL --> Apply

  Apply -->|defines associations| Assoc[Education_ContentCDN]
  Apply -->|defines accessors| Accessors[Education_ClassroomService]

  View[Education_LMS_Portal]
  View -->|uploads per-locale| Controller

  Controller[Education_GradeSync] -->|permits locale params or maps| Model
  Model -->|writer methods| ActiveStorage[Education_ClassroomService]
  ActiveStorage --> A

  Serve[Education_ClassroomService] -->|serves blob| UserBrowser[Education_ClassroomService]

  Accessors -->|getter fallback| Fallback[Education_LMS_Portal]
  Fallback --> ActiveStorage

  classDef infra fill:#f8f9fa,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
  class DB,Init,B,Apply,Assoc,Accessors,View,Controller,ActiveStorage,Serve,Fallback infra;

repo_description: The Better Together Community Engine is an accessible open source community platform that's Democratic by Design. All are welcome!
